newsitem.title: SPAIN: GOLF - ALLENBY HITS ONE SHOT FOR CASH BONUS.
newsitem.headline: GOLF - ALLENBY HITS ONE SHOT FOR CASH BONUS.

text.p: Injured Australian Robert Allenby hit one shot that could earn him $117,000 in the Volvo Masters at Valderrama on Thursday.
Allenby took out his three-wood and off a backswing of no more than 18 inches dribbled the ball about 35 yards down the first hole.
He then announced that he was withdrawing from the tournament because of the fractured sternum he suffered in a car accident four weeks ago.
Allenby needed to hit one shot to satisfy a European Tour requirement that he played in the tournament to qualify for the bonus money he would earn after the event.
He is currently third on the money list and will collect the extra prize if his position remains unchanged after the tournament.
